title: Business Booms For Gaza Ice Man, Just As Power Fades
teaser: In Gaza City, one business in particular is thriving: Ice Man. People line up to buy bags of crushed ice to cool drinks and keep medications at the right temperature â€” as long as the owner can get gasoline for his generator.
